about_the_game:
Welcome to our thrilling new game set in a fantasy world filled with monsters! In this game you will encounter several different characters, skills, monsters, and bosses.

Choose from several different characters to play as, each with their own unique set of skills and abilities. Whether you prefer to play as a powerful mage, a stealthy rogue, or a heavily-armored warrior, there's a character that will suit your playstyle.

As you progress through the levels, you will encounter a variety of different monsters, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. From hordes of skeletons and zombies to powerful demons and spiders, you'll need to use all of your skills and abilities to survive.



In addition to the standard monsters, you will also encounter several challenging bosses throughout the level. These bosses will put your skills to the test, and require careful strategy and quick reflexes to defeat.



To aid you in your quest, you will have access to a variety of different skills and abilities. From powerful spells and devastating attacks to sneaky traps and useful buffs, you'll need to carefully choose which skills to use in each situation.



So, are you ready to enter this dangerous and exciting fantasy world? Play now and see if you have what it takes to survive and emerge victorious!

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon violence and bloodless fight scenes.

name: Dunland: Survivors Story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In this fantasy world overrun by monsters, survive and thrive in this roguelike game. Drawing inspiration from Vampires Survivors, enjoy a gripping story and challenging gameplay mechanics.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
